name: 柯俊宏
objective:
With the trend of population aging, industries related to health care are already developing a huge market, in which biomedical engineering plays a very important role.

Biomedical engineering (Biomedical engineering) is an interdisciplinary discipline, which mainly uses various engineering knowledge and technologies to assist in biological research, and to provide information that is helpful for diagnosis or assisting diseases in medicine, treatment and Prevention.

In this broad category, we will focus on the field of medical electrical engineering, especially in laser medicine to provide information that is helpful for diagnosis or assist in the treatment and prevention of diseases.

Laser is one of the three great inventions of the 20th century, and medical laser has been widely used in various medical fields. The scope covered in this course will be discussed in depth: 
1. Basic principles of laser
2. Various applications of laser in medicine
3. Application of laser in dentistry
4. Advanced thesis writing in laser medicine.
